name: e-commerce-database
description: This is the back-end for an e-commerce database, using an Express.js API to use Sequelize to interact with a MySQL database. The database can be updated using the API URLs. An e-commerce site can store their data about many products, and organize them with categories and tags.
author: Ben Storlie <benjstorlie@gmail.com> (https://benjstorlie.github.io/)
